name: FormulaX
summary: FormulaX is a NEW racing game from the creators of MotoX! 🏎️💨🏁  Get behind the wheel of Formula style high speed race cars with realistic driving mechanics! Hug turns as you feel the engine rev, but be careful of your tires! You'll need to stop at the pits to change your tires if your going to win! Compete against players worldwide in multiplayer races or test your skills in single-player mode & time trials. Customize your racing machine & master legendary race circuits!
